title: Add static product images and galleries for Hospital Furniture and Laboratory Setup

requirements.summary: Add required generated static images and define reusable English alt text strings in frontend content data.
acceptanceCriteria: New image files are added under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
Each new image has an English alt text string defined in frontend content/data (not hardcoded only in JSX) so it can be used consistently in the UI.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static image asset: Hospital bed in a clean patient room with side rails and bedside table.
Add the generated static image asset: Clinical examination room with an examination table and storage cabinets.
Add the generated static image asset: Medical trolley/cart and modular storage furniture in a hospital corridor setting.
Add the generated static image asset: Modern laboratory bench with instruments, shelves, and organized glassware.
Add the generated static image asset: Close-up of diagnostic lab analyzer equipment in a bright lab environment.

Create a content module that exports Hospital Furniture and Laboratory Setup gallery image entries (static /assets/generated/... src + meaningful English alt text) so alt text is managed in data rather than only inline in JSX.

requirements.summary: Update the Hospital Furniture category data to include a card photo and descriptive English alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/categories.ts includes a photo and photoAlt for the category with id 'furniture'.
On the Products page category grid, the Hospital Furniture card renders its photo at the top (using the existing CategoryCard behavior) without breaking the layout for the other categories.

file_operations.description: Add photo and photoAlt to the 'furniture' category using one of the new Hospital Furniture images (e.g., /assets/generated/hospital-furniture-bedroom.dim_1200x800.jpg) with a descriptive English alt text. (Optional tidy-up: align the Laboratory Setup card photo to one of the new laboratory images if needed, while keeping structure unchanged.)

requirements.summary: Add responsive image gallery sections for Hospital Furniture and Laboratory Setup on the Products page using new static assets and content-defined alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx includes a "Hospital Furniture" section containing a responsive image grid/gallery that renders at least 3 Hospital Furniture images from frontend/public/assets/generated.

frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx includes a "Laboratory Setup" section containing a responsive image grid/gallery that renders at least 2 Laboratory Setup images from frontend/public/assets/generated (in addition to the existing Laboratory Setup category card photo).
All images rendered in these galleries include meaningful English alt text.
No images are served from the backend; all new images are referenced via /assets/generated/... paths.

file_operations.description: Create a small presentational ImageGallery component that renders a responsive grid of static images (src + alt) with styling consistent with existing Products page sections; ensure it accepts data entries from content modules and does not hardcode alt text.

Import gallery data from frontend/src/content/productGalleries.ts and render two new sections (Hospital Furniture and Laboratory Setup) using Section + ImageGallery. Ensure Hospital Furniture shows at least 3 images and Laboratory Setup shows at least 2 images, all referenced via /assets/generated/... and with alt text sourced from content data; keep layout responsive for mobile and desktop and consistent with existing ICU/OT detail sections.
